trait.name: Elemental Restoration
entries: If the efreeti dies outside the Elemental Plane of Fire, its body dissolves into ash, and it gains a new body in {@dice 1d4} days, reviving with all its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} somewhere on the Plane of Fire.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The efreeti has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Wishes
entries: The efreeti has a 30 percent chance of knowing the {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell. If the efreeti knows it, the efreeti can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the efreeti can understand. If the efreeti casts the spell for the creature, the efreeti suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the efreeti has cast it three times, the efreeti can't do so again for 365 days.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreeti makes three attacks, using Heated Blade or Hurl Flame in any combination.

action.name: Heated Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) Slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) Fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
